title: REMASTERED – Episode 13: Off the Path
itunes:title: REMASTERED – Episode 13: Off the Path
description:
In this remastered edition of a classic Lore episode, we revisit the concept of curses, and take a tour through some of the most powerful examples. With fresh narration and production, and a brand new story at the end.

————————

Lore Resources: 

  • Episode Music: lorepodcast.com/music 
  • Episode Sources: lorepodcast.com/sources 
  • All the shows from Grim & Mild: www.grimandmild.com
